title: Senior Executive (Ecommerce)
description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Senior Executive to oversee and manage the operations of our eCommerce platform. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales growth, ensuring stock availability, managing pricing and listings, enhancing content, improving listing ranking, and optimizing onsite visibility. This role also involves order management, fulfilment, and after-sales service, as well as the development and execution of effective eCommerce strategies and marketing campaigns.

 

Details of the key responsibilities as follow:

  1. Drive online sales performance and optimize product offerings through data analysis.
  2. Maintain accurate stock levels to meet demand.
  3. Implement competitive pricing strategies and manage product listings to enhance visibility.
  4. Improve content for product listings to boost ranking and visibility using SEO best practices.
  5. Enhance user experience and increase traffic through data-driven optimization of site navigation and product placement.
  6. Ensure timely order fulfilment and optimize shipping processes in coordination with logistics partners.
  7. Manage customer inquiries, returns, and refunds to enhance customer satisfaction and retention.
  8. Develop and propose strategies for sales growth and market expansion, supported by market research.
  9. Plan and execute online marketing campaigns, aligning them with overall business goals.
  10. Prepare performance reports and provide insights for continuous improvement based on data analysis.
  11. Perform any additional tasks assigned by the company.

title: Content Creator Specialist
description:
We are seeking a talented and creative bilingual content creator to join our dynamic team at JR Life Sciences, a leading local health supplement company. The ideal candidate will have a passion for health and wellness, a keen understanding of our target audience, and the ability to create compelling content in both English and Chinese. You will be responsible for creating, curating, and managing content across social media channels. Your role will be to engage our audiences, increase our brand visibility, and drive traffic and conversions through strategic social media efforts.

 

Details of the key responsibilities as follow:

  1. Create engaging content for social media and digital advertising campaigns.
  2. Assist in social media management of TikTok and Xiao Hong Shu including content uploads, monitoring DMs, and responding effectively.
  3. Ensure consistency in brand messaging and tone.
  4. Grow the social media community.
  5. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies.
  6. Perform other ad hoc duties and projects as assigned.

 

Content Creation

  1. Develop and produce high-quality, engaging content such as blog posts, videos, infographics, social media posts, and advertisements for various e-marketplaces and social media platforms including, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok & Xiao Hong Shu etc.
  2. Create a variety of content types which are visually appealing and informative including videos, graphics, and text posts that align with our brand’s objectives.
  3. Plan and execute content calendars to ensure consistent and timely posting.

 

Creator Management

  1. Source creators that are the right fit for the brand, forming a group of regular LIVE sellers at long term.
  2. Conceptualise LIVE selling flow and/or script as a guide for creators when executing LIVE selling during BAU, Mega Campaigns and New Product Launch.
  3. Provide support to Creator during LIVE Selling (i.e. guide during LIVE, assist in customer enquiries alongside with nutritionist, etc.)
  4. Evaluate effectiveness of creator using metrics such as engagement, revenue, etc.
  5. Manage LIVE selling calendar to match BAU, Mega Campaigns and New Product Launch schedules.

title: Packer
description:
The Packer is responsible for preparing health supplement products for shipment by packing them securely, ensuring that all products meet the company’s quality standards, and maintaining a clean and organized packing area. The Packer plays a crucial role in ensuring that customers receive their orders accurately and in excellent condition. Details of the key responsibilities as follow:

  1. Accurately pack health supplement products according to order specifications, ensuring they are securely packed with appropriate materials to prevent damage during transit.
  2. Inspect products for defects or damage before packing, ensuring they meet the company’s quality standards and reporting any issues to the superior immediately.
  3. Verify that all items in an order are correct and accounted for before packing by checking packing slips against orders to ensure accuracy.
  4. Label packages with accurate and legible shipping information and complete all necessary shipment documentation.
  5. Assist in maintaining an organized and accurate inventory of packing materials and report low stock levels to the superior.
  6. Maintain a clean and organized packing area by following all safety protocols and guidelines and using personal protective equipment (PPE) as required.
  7. Work closely with the Stock Management Team to ensure efficient and accurate order processing, communicating effectively with team members and management.
  8. Perform any additional tasks assigned by the company.

title: Store Assistant
description:
The Store Assistant plays a vital role in the efficient operation of the warehouse by assisting with the receiving, storage, and distribution of goods. The position requires close attention to detail, effective communication skills, and adherence to safety and organizational procedures. The Store Assistant will ensure that inventory is managed accurately and that goods are handled with care. Details of the key responsibilities as follow:

  1. Inspect incoming shipments, verify quantity and quality, and label cartons.
  2. Store items in designated warehouse locations following inventory protocols, ensuring proper stacking and storage to maximize space and prevent damage.
  3. Pick and verify items for orders (consignment or purchase), pack them securely, and label them correctly for delivery.
  4. Inspect and process returned goods, update inventory records, and follow company policies for restocking, disposal, or returns to suppliers.
  5. Maintain warehouse cleanliness and organization, adhere to 5S principles, and promptly address housekeeping issues to ensure safety and efficiency.
  6. Monitor inventory levels, collaborate with other departments, participate in stock audits, and maintain effective communication and organizational skills.
  7. Perform any additional tasks assigned by the company.

title: Promoter
description:

  2. Understand customer needs and provide expert advice on products and services, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
  3. Assist customers with product inquiries and provide detailed information about the benefits and usage of health supplements.
  4. Continuously acquire knowledge about industry trends, products, and market conditions to enhance sales techniques.
  5. Manage after-sales services, addressing customer concerns and ensuring a positive customer experience.

title: Merchandiser
description:
The Merchandiser is responsible for ensuring that products are optimally displayed and stocked in stores to maximize sales and enhance the customer experience. This role involves building and maintaining strong relationships with store personnel, monitoring and analysing competitor activities, and ensuring the effective execution of promotional activities. The Merchandiser will also support various events, maintain store counters, and perform stock take activities as required.

 

Details of the key responsibilities as follow:

  1. Develop and maintain effective relationships with store managers and staff, gathering feedback to guide product strategies.
  2. Ensure products are well-displayed and adequately stocked, manage stock rotation, and remove near-expired items following FIFO practices.
  3. Monitor and report on competitor activities and pricing.
  4. Effectively communicate operational issues with superiors.
  5. Secure additional free display space for products.
  6. Assist with the setup, tear down, and support of events and promotions.
  7. Ensure correct display of price tags and set up promotional materials for each promotional cycle.
  8. Keep the counter area clean and tidy.
  9. Participate in stock-taking activities.
  10. Perform additional tasks as assigned by the company.

  • Maintain organized tender depository and administration (digital records in ACP folders and physical records in secure locked cabinet).
  • Update and maintain Contract Master Listing for tracking expiration and renewal, rebates reimbursement date and structures.
  • Upload, update and maintain SAP information relating to contracts (ie. contractual price, vendor code, contract start and end date, Price Info Record (PIR), Outline Agreement etc). Verify the information are correct and filing of such evidence.
  • Electronically track and maintain Agreement Number Registry (ie. Issue agreement number to requestor and update the contract signing date).
  • Archive documents relating to CMT including but not limited to (i) SOP for contract & tender (ii) Job description for CMT (iii) Standard Work Instructions relating to CMT (iv) SAP access code granted to CMT (v) Sunburst Connect access matrix for CMT.
  • Training record Management.
  • Report status of current contract progress to management.
  • Computation of cost savings/cost avoidance generated from definitive agreement and monthly tracking and reporting secured and realised cost saving.
  • Analyse & understand every clause in the terms and conditions and the potential risks involved & the chances of its occurrence with specific contract terms and negotiate those terms and conditions with the Vendors.
  • Consult our POC for Insurance related clauses, POC for Duties and Taxes related clauses, POC for legal related clauses and seek approved vendor clearance from VMT.
  • Administer the contract and resolve any existing contractual conflicts.
  • Work with different levels of personnel intra and/or inter organization to analyse and solidify an overall contract strategy.
  • Evaluate and analysis of Tender (Quotation Summary)
  • Actively pursue and identify areas of cost saving /avoidance opportunities within his/her assigned categories & achieve the cost saving target assigned in the goal setting.
  • Tracking and managing supplier contractual KPI, rebates/discounts reimbursement/Quarterly brief.
  • Generation of SAP reports by BUs relating to PO Spend, Consignment Inventory, Min and Max Qty, etc

title: Duty Manager
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES

 

  • Assist the Assistant Front Office Manager in setting up the Front Desk training tools such as job descriptions, standards and procedures, and training plans as a guideline for the Front Desk operation.
  • Train and supervise the Front Desk Assistants in all reception and cashiering procedures and assign tasks as necessary.
  • Assist with new employee orientation and training and ensure that all Front Desk personnel are advised and trained on all changes in policies and procedures.
  • Continuously monitor, study and evaluate operations, policy and procedures of the Front Desk; and propose necessary improvements to Assistant Front Office Manager.
  • Plan, prepare and conduct ongoing training for Front Desk Personnel on a regular basis.

  • Ensure all outstanding and pending issues are settled timely.
  • To exercise control over all other Front Office staff in the absence of their respective supervisors.
  • To ensure that all keys and folders for daily arrivals are prepared by the Front Office Assistant.
  • To ensure that the Front office, the lobby area is kept clean at all times.
  • To make daily round of all Front Desk and Bell Desk operating departments to check that all staff adhere to Hotel policies.
  • To be well informed of hotel facilities and be able to answer all inquiries.
  • To handle complaints or incidents/accidents occurring in the hotel when necessary.
  • To respond to emergency calls, fire alarm, power failure, computer and medical attention and co-ordinate with respective Departments and contacts.
  • To conduct daily Front Office briefing.
  • To spot-check special set-ups for late VIP guest’s arrival ensuring that they adhere to the required standard.
  • To ensure that Energy conservation is exercised in all areas at all times.
  • To read through and approve the Rooms Statistic Report.
  • Assist with Front Desk employees’ performance evaluations and recommend promotions or demotions of assigned Personnel.
  • Supervise all Front Desk Assistants assigned to his/her shift and ensure that all tasks are performed and completed.
  • Assist with check in, information requests, check out and other services required by the guests to ensure their comfort and satisfaction.
  • Authorise the acceptance of travelers cheques, cash advance, rebates, paid out, refunds base on the established procedures.
  • Responsible for the orderly and clutter-free appearance of the Front Desk personnel; ensure that all Front Desk personnel are well groomed and in proper uniform.
  • Ensure that the manual key, guest card key, and guest room security procedures are followed.
  • Ensure a smooth flow of check-in and check-out during peak hours; if necessary direct guests to available Front Desk Assistant.
  • Ensure that all telephone calls are handled promptly within three rings.
  • To keep Personal Grooming at the highest standard and make sure that subordinates have the same.
  • Maintain safety by adhering to safety policies, and be responsible to report accidents immediately.
  • Deal with the public in a professional and courteous manner.
  • Ability to communicate with all managers and supervisors and fellow associates.
  • Ability to handle conflict situations in a professional manner.
  • To write reports relating to complaints, and forward copies to various executive/department heads concerned.
  • To record all complaints into a log book for the General Manager's attention or follow up.
  • Prepare schedules and maintain Front Desk attendance record.

title: Network Administrator
description:
Job Description

We are seeking a skilled Network Administrator with 2-3 years of experience to join our team. You will handle network monitoring, security system management (including IDP (Intrusion Detection and Prevention) and IPS (Intrusion Prevention System)), security technologies (including EDP and XDR), change management documentation, green field implementations, and cloud integration.

Responsibilities:

• Monitor network performance for uptime and security.

• Manage firewalls, including Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDP) and Intrusion Prevention System (IPS).

• Configure VPNs (Virtual Private Network), IPsec, SD-WAN, MPLS, Policy Management, ExpressRoute, and Cloud Connect.

• Work on migration projects and greenfield implementations.

• Document network changes according to change management procedures.

• Integrate network services with cloud platforms like Azure, Google Cloud, and AWS (Apache Web Server).

• Performing Regular Security Audits on the networks (VAPT) • Implement EDP and XDR initiatives.

title: Full-time Retail Sales Associate - NIKE (Changi City Point)
company_name: Nike Global Trading B.V. Singapore Branch
description:
Join the Nike Team as a Full-Time Sales Associate (Athlete)

Looking for your next move?
If you’ve got energy, a positive attitude, and a passion for sports or style – we want you on our team! Nike is hiring full-time Sales Associates (we call them Athletes) to be part of our fast-moving, high-performing retail family.

What You'll Be Doing:
As a Nike Athlete, you’ll play a big part in creating a top-notch experience for every customer who walks through our doors. You’ll get hands-on training and support to grow into different parts of the store – from helping customers, keeping things looking sharp, to getting stock on the shelves.

Your day-to-day will include:

1. Helping customers find the right gear and making them feel welcome
2. Handling payments at the cashier
3. Restocking and organizing products on the floor
4. Supporting backroom operations like receiving deliveries
5. Keeping the store clean, tidy, and looking great
6. Jumping in to help your teammates wherever needed
7. Getting involved in fun store events and promotions

title: Procurement Specialist
description:
🎨 We’re Hiring: Procurement Specialist

Location: Singapore
Employment Type: Full-Time

The Role

As the Procurement Specialist, you will be a key leader in our operations team, driving the strategic sourcing, procurement, and vendor management processes. You will ensure the timely acquisition of high-quality materials, furniture, and services for our interior design projects while optimizing costs and fostering strong supplier relationships. This role requires a blend of strategic vision, operational expertise, and collaborative leadership to support ID21’s growth and project excellence.

 

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategic Procurement Planning: Develop and implement procurement strategies that align with ID21’s project goals and long-term business objectives.
  • Supplier Management: Identify, evaluate and onboard suppliers, negotiating contracts to secure competitive pricing, favorable terms and reliable delivery schedules.
  • End-to-End Procurement Oversight: Manage the full procurement lifecycle, including requisition, purchase order creation, supplier coordination and delivery tracking.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner with project managers, designers, quantity surveyors and finance teams to ensure materials meet design specifications, project timelines and budget constraints.
  • Cost Optimization: Analyze market trends, supplier pricing and material availability to identify cost-saving opportunities without compromising quality.
  • Quality and Compliance: Ensure all procured materials and services meet ID21’s quality standards and comply with Singapore’s procurement regulations and industry standards.
  • Vendor Performance Monitoring: Establish KPIs to evaluate supplier performance, address issues proactively and maintain long-term partnerships.
  • Process Improvement: Leverage data and procurement tools to streamline processes, reduce lead times and enhance supply chain efficiency.
  • Reporting and Analysis: Maintain accurate procurement records, generate reports on spending and performance, and provide strategic insights to senior management.
  • Sustainability Focus: Explore eco-friendly materials and suppliers to align with ID21’s commitment to sustainable design practices.
location: 1 Kim Seng Promenade, Great World, Singapore

description:
⚙️ We're Hiring: M&E Senior / Project Manager

Location: Singapore | Employment Type: Full-Time

Are you a proactive and detail-oriented M&E professional passionate about delivering high-quality interior fit-out and construction projects? Join us to lead end-to-end Mechanical & Electrical (M&E) works, from design coordination to final handover.

 

🔧 Key Competencies & Responsibilities

🏗️ Technical Site Supervision & Compliance

  • Oversee and coordinate M&E system installations (including ACMV and electrical services) to ensure alignment with design specifications, Singapore codes (e.g. CP5), and safety standards.
  • Conduct regular site inspections, identifying and resolving technical challenges to maintain project momentum.

📅 Project & Schedule Management

  • Monitor project milestones and timelines, proactively managing risks and delays with appropriate mitigation plans.
  • Lead the testing, commissioning, and handover process with full documentation and client acceptance.

🔌 Problem-Solving & Operational Excellence

  • Act as the first responder to on-site electrical and mechanical issues, delivering fast, practical solutions without compromising design or deadlines.
  • Investigate incidents and submit incident reports where required, ensuring workplace safety and regulatory compliance.

🔄 Cross-Disciplinary Collaboration

  • Work closely with interior designers, consultants, and project managers to ensure seamless integration of M&E systems into the broader fit-out works.
  • Provide regular progress updates to internal and external stakeholders in a clear and timely manner.

📘 Project Closure & Documentation

  • Lead the preparation of as-built documentation, manuals, and client training (if applicable) during the project close-out phase.
  • Ensure that all M&E deliverables meet quality standards, client expectations, and regulatory requirements.

title: Head of Business Development (Service Industry)
description:
As the Head of Business Development in an integrated facility management company, your role would encompass a wide range of responsibilities aimed at driving growth and expanding the company's market presence. This role requires a blend of strategic thinking, leadership, and hands-on business development expertise, with a strong understanding of the healthcare and facility management sectors.

Key job responsibilities:

Strategic Planning and Market Analysis

  • Develop and implement business development strategies aligned with the company's goals.
  • Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities, emerging trends, and competitive landscape.
  • Analyse the healthcare market to understand client needs and tailor services to meet those demands.
  • Identify opportunities for service innovation and expansion in line with market trends and client feedback.

Client Relationship Management

  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders
  • Act as the primary point of contact for major clients, ensuring high levels of client satisfaction.
  • Develop customised solutions for clients to address their specific facility management needs.
  • Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and meetings to build networks and promote the company’s services.
  • Engage with industry associations and professional bodies to stay informed of industry developments and opportunities.

Sales and Revenue Growth

  • Results driven and lead the business development team in identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, including cross-selling and up-selling services.
  • Proven track records securing new accounts and manage key accounts
  • Develop and execute strategies to achieve revenue targets and expand the company's client base.
  • Negotiate contracts and close deals with clients, ensuring profitability and long-term partnerships.

Proposal and Contract Management

  • Attend site surveys, oversee the preparation of proposals and costings, bids, and tender documents in response to client requests and market opportunities.
  • Experience in clients’ RFP/RFQ/NDA/SLA processes and assessing tender platforms GeBiz, Tender Bot, Ariba, Sesami and etc.
  • Ensure that all contracts are managed effectively, with attention to compliance, risk management, and financial performance.
  • Collaborate with legal and finance teams to finalise contracts and ensure all terms are met.

Collaboration and Cross-functional Leadership

  • Work closely with other departments (e.g., Operations and Finance) to ensure seamless delivery of services to clients.
  • Provide leadership and mentorship to the business development team, fostering a high-performance culture.

Reporting and Performance Monitoring

  • Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the effectiveness of business development strategies.
  • Prepare regular reports for senior management on business development activities, market conditions, and financial performance.
  • Adjust strategies as necessary to respond to market changes or underperformance.

Business Development Director Qualifications/Skills:

  • Strategic planning skills and negotiation skills
  • Excellent presentation and communication skills
  • Lead generation and management experience
  • Fast learner with enthusiasm and sincerity
